issue.title: [Docker] docker-compose build lint fails
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4381](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4381). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```Java

$ docker-compose build lint
Building lint
Step 1/4 : FROM arrow:python-3.6
ERROR: Service 'lint' failed to build: pull access denied for arrow, repository does not exist or may require 'docker login'
```
